author: Maggie Eckl
description: Bittersweet and fruity, with complex aromatics from the pisco and strong flavours of gentian liqueur.
name: The Artist's Muse
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
